mapper.insert: insert into pub_history (id, product_id, project_id, product_version, project_version, publish_time, create_time) values (#{id}, #{productId}, #{projectId}, #{productVersion}, #{projectVersion}, #{publishTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update pub_history set product_id = #{productId}, project_id = #{projectId}, product_version = #{productVersion}, project_version = #{projectVersion}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, create_time = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from pub_history order by create_time desc
select * from pub_history where product_id = #{productId} order by create_time
select * from pub_history where project_id = #{projectId} order by create_time
